about.title: About
graphics.title: Graphics settings
controls.title: Controls
actionDescriptions.stopTime: Stop the time in the game, with controls still available
actionDescriptions.toggleTextVisibility: Toggle the visibility of the texts on screen
actionDescriptions.forward: Forward thrust (free mode) or increase speed
actionDescriptions.reverse: Reverse thrust (free mode) or decrease speed
actionDescriptions.controlCamera: Hold this button to control the camera instead of your spacecraft if you have the same controls assigned
actionDescriptions.cameraMoveLeft: Move the camera to the left (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraMoveRight: Move the camera to the right (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraMoveUp: Move the camera upwards (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraMoveDown: Move the camera downwards (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraMoveForward: Move the camera forward (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraMoveBackward: Move the camera backward (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraTurnLeft: Turn the camera to the left (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraTurnRight: Turn the camera to the right (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraTurnUp: Turn the camera upwards (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraTurnDown: Turn the camera downwards (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraRollLeft: Roll the camera to the left (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraRollRight: Roll the camera to the right (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraDecreaseFOV: Zoom in (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.cameraIncreaseFOV: Zoom out (if possible for the current view)
actionDescriptions.nextView: Change to the next view of the currently followed spacecraft or the scene
actionDescriptions.previousView: Change to the previous view of the currently followed spacecraft or the scene
actionDescriptions.resetView: Reset the current view to its original state
